name: DreamComeTrue
description:
This game world was created with RPG Maker MZ. To practice my world-building skills, I created a universe where people can pay to have specific dreams and put the players in the shoes of a girl who just started working at this peculiar dream factory called DreamComeTrue. 

I focused on making the world emerge through dialogues, descriptions, environments and quests, so I consider this an almost-finished (please let me know if you find any bugs/errors!) game world design project!

Enjoy, and sleep well :)
